Actions.Name: Snap Shot
Effects: May dash up to 2 before this attack.

Combo.Name: Warping Shot
Combo.Effects: Foe warps and stretches, swapping places with another character in range 2 from them, then becoming dazed.

Actions.Name: Blinding Dust
Actions.Description: A foe in range is blinded, then the [name] gains stealth.

Actions.Name: Warped Reflection
Actions.Description: The [name]'s appearance and that of those around them ripples disconcertingly. The [name] gains aura 2 until the start of its next turn. All characters in the aura gain evasion and dodge.
